Player History
Had first career hit on 4/15/1965, off Moe Drabowsky (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1965, off Jim B. Weaver (CLE)...
Injured on 7/20/1965 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 4/8/1967...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Detroit on 4/20/1967...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1967, hitting .483 with 0 HR, 2 RBI...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 4/13/1968...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Baltimore on 6/12/1969...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 6/25/1969 (Going to STL: C E. Battey, SS T. Reynolds, 2B B. Allen, RF W. Horton. Going to MIN: 1B S. Garvey, 3B M. Rogodzinski)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1970...
Traded from St. Louis to New York (N) on 5/22/1972 (Going to STL: RF V. Pinson. Going to NYM: RF W. Horton)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/26/1972, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1972, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 17 RBI...
Injured on 4/9/1975 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1975...
Injured on 5/22/1977 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Baltimore on 7/31/1977 (Going to NYM: LF O. Moreno. Going to BAL: RF W. Horton)...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 4/1/1978 to a 1-year deal worth $1,604,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/18/1978, off Dan Vossler (DET)...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/5/1979 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/19/1980 to a 1-year deal worth $3,260,000 per year...
